about_the_game:
Shadow Overlord: The Beginning

Become the Lord of Shadows in our exciting indie strategy game! Engage in challenging medieval battles as you command an army of the undead on your quest for domination. Lead your dark creatures in the conquest of towns and castles, all while immersing yourself in a captivating fantasy world.

Experience the thrill of real-time strategy as you take control of your army and plunge into epic battles. The side camera puts you in the center of the action, allowing you to watch your every move on the battlefield. Become the essence of a dark entity and make crucial decisions to upgrade and evolve your units, preparing them for the ultimate challenge.

Develop your army of the undead as you collect magical essence from the places you ravage and conquer. Use this energy to summon the great Dark Lord, an entity of unimaginable power that will turn the tide of battle in your favor. Discover the satisfaction of strategizing and seeing your tactics unfold on the battlefield.

With a polygon graphic style that adds a unique touch to the game, you will be immersed in a dark and captivating world. Do you have what it takes to lead your dark hosts to victory? Master the strategy, evolve your units and make the medieval kingdoms tremble under your power.

Get ready for an intense and exciting strategy experience in our indie game, where the fate of your undead army and the quest for ultimate power rest in your hands!

Become the Lord of Shadows in our exciting indie strategy game! Engage in challenging medieval battles as you command an army of the undead on your quest for domination. Lead your dark creatures in the conquest of towns and castles, all while immersing yourself in a captivating fantasy world.

Experience the thrill of real-time strategy as you take control of your army and plunge into epic battles. Develop your army of the undead as you collect magical essence from the places you ravage and conquer. With a polygon graphic style that adds a unique touch to the game, you will be immersed in a dark and captivating world. Do you have what it takes to lead your dark hosts to victory? Master the strategy, evolve your units and make the medieval kingdoms tremble under your power.

name: Shadow Overlord: The Beginning

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: Intel Core i3, 2.4GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 / AMD Radeon HD 6850
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: Intel Core i5, 2.8GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 / AMD R9 390
  • DirectX: Version 11

short_description: As a player, you will have to lead your armies of undead and magical creatures to expand Your empire and defeat your enemies. With an exciting plot and a challenging gameplay, this game will take you through epic and dangerous adventure battles while you become the most powerful ruler.
